overview: Carlo A. von Schroeter has a successful track record of investing in middle market companies across a diverse range of industries since 1990. Prior to co-founding WestView Capital in 2004, Carlo was a General Partner of Weston Presidio, a private equity firm which manages five funds totaling over $3.3 billion in capital. Carlo joined Weston Presidio in 1992 as the second professional in its Boston office and actively participated in, and contributed to, the growth of Weston Presidio over 12 years. Prior to Weston Presidio, Carlo was a Vice President at Security Pacific Capital, a long standing private equity and venture capital group. Prior to Security Pacific Capital, Carlo was a District Engineering Manager at Shell Canada Limited responsible for the Eastern Ontario region.
